alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Lafayette; Upper St. Martin; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 10:53AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lafayette, southern Acadia, Vermilion and west central St. Martin Parishes through 1130 AM CST... At 1052 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Forked Island, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Crowley, Abbeville, Scott, Kaplan, Gueydan, Mermentau, Forked Island, Intracoastal City, Broussard, Youngsville, Erath, Maurice, Morse, Wright, Lyons Point, Henry, Riceville, Meaux and Esther. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Acadia; Lafayette; Upper St. Martin; Vermilion
